items.sentence: Tom and Mary are sitting at a table over near the jukebox.
Tom and Mary became friends when they were in high school.
Tom and Mary congratulated each other on their promotions.
What Tom really wanted was a good friend he could talk to.
Tom took a picture of Mary\'s new car and sent it to John.
Tom wishes Mary wouldn\'t always go shopping on Saturdays.
We talked about what had happened to us when we were kids.
I can\'t buy that now, because I don\'t have enough money.
If I see Tom, I\'ll tell him that you\'re looking for him.
If Tom didn\'t think we needed help, he wouldn\'t be here.
